Text: The Testimony is a 2015 American short-documentary film which chronicles the largest rape tribunal in the history of the Democratic Republic of the Congo as a result of M23 rebellion fighting.

Text: The Testimony (2015 film):  It is directed and shot by Vanessa Block and produced by Block, Steve Tisch, Mitchell Block and Michael Sarnoski.

<Text: The Testimony (2015 film):  "The Testimony " was shortlisted with ten other documentaries from 74 entries submitted to the 88th Academy Awards in Documentary Short Subject category.>
